ReportText: DATE OF EXAM: 08/14/2020 EXAMINATION: CHEST SINGLE VIEW PORTABLE, CLINICAL INDICATION: eval for pneumonia. COMPARISON: Radiograph chest, 08/16/2020, [ADDRESS]. FINDINGS: There are low lung volumes; there are multifocal subsegmental areas of infiltrate noted within both lungs that can be attributable to a multifocal bilateral pneumonitis. There are no discrete pulmonary mass lesions. There are no conspicuous pleural effusions. There is no pneumothorax. The cardiomediastinum appears unremarkable. IMPRESSION: There are low lung volumes; multifocal subsegmental areas of infiltrate noted within both lungs that can be attributable to a multifocal bilateral pneumonitis. Electronically signed by [[PERSONALNAME], M.D. on 08/14/2020 4:42 PM
